Articles.Content:
This is my stuff for names and crap.

Sun (Kerbol): Kerbolar

Moho: Mohish

Eve: Evian

Gilly: Gillian

Kerbin: Kerban

Mun: Munar

Minmus: Minman

Duna: Dunese

Ike: Ikean

Dres: Dreslian

Jool: Joolian

Laythe: Laythian

Vall: Vallar

Tylo: Tylian

Bop: Boply

Pol: Polish

Eeloo: Eeloon

Apoapsis/Periapsis names (Apsides)

Kerbol: Apkelion/Perikelion

Moho: Apomo/Perimo

Eve: Apeve/Pereve

Gilly: Apogil/Perigil

Kerbin: Apokee/Perikee

Mun: Apomun/Perimun

Minmus: Apomin/Perimin

Duna: Apodun/Peridun

Ike: Apoike/Peryike

Dres: Apodres/Peridres

Jool: Apojole/perjole

Laythe: Aplaythe/Perilaythe

Vall: Apovall/Perivall

Tylo: Apotie/Peritie

Bop: Apobop/Peribop

Pol: Apol/Peripol

Eeloo: Apocold/Pericold

People of planets:

Kerbol: Kerbals in general

Moho: Mohonians

Eve: Evians

Gilly: Gilligans

Kerbin: Prime Kerbals

Mun: Munatics

Minmus: Minmars (Desserters)

Duna: Dunese

Ike: Ikeans

Dres/Asteroid Belt: Belters

Jool: Clouders

Laythe: Laythians

Vall: Underminers

Tylo: Tylooians

Bop and Pol: Shipyard workers (Bop and Pol is where starships are built due to the low gravity and high amount of resources)

Bop: Boppers

Pol: Pollen

Eeloo: Eskermos

Edited December 23, 2013 by GregroxMun

Nice list, great for RPing your missions. Although I was kinda hoping to see a people of the planets with an -ites ending. Perhaps Vallnites?

Edited December 22, 2013 by WhiteWeasel

Nice list, great for RPing your missions. Although I was kinda hoping to see a people of the planets with an -ites ending. Perhaps Vallnites?

*LOL* As a machinist calling someone 'Vallnite' will almost make me think of them being formed from carbide. Um, I guess if you're not in the industry that doesn't really make sense OK, Valenite is a company that makes inserts for tooling.
